data.eml:eml: Two new species of the genus Nemognathomimus (Coleoptera: Cerambycidae) from Mexico and Guatemala

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gutiérrez, Nayeli, Noguera, Felipe A. (2017): Two new species of the genus Nemognathomimus (Coleoptera: Cerambycidae) from Mexico and Guatemala. Zootaxa 4365 (1): 71-80, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4365.1.4
